he depression over the southwest Bay of Bengal has intensified into a deep depression. The
system   was located to southeast about 170km of Batticaloa and 240 km of Trincomalee at
around 11:00 a.m. of 26th November 2024. It is likely to move closer to the east coast of the
island and intensify further into a cyclonic storm on 27th November.

nder influence of the system cloudy skies will prevailed over most parts of the island, very
heavy  showers  and  strong  gusty  winds  can  be  expected  in  Northern,  Northcentral,  Eastern,

howers or thundershowers will occur at times in most places of the island. Very heavy showers
above 200 mm are likely at some places in Northern, North-central, Eastern, Central, Uva and
Southern provinces and in Puttalam district.
